name: SUPER/LOOPER (B&W Game Jam)
description:
I didn't have nearly as much time to work on this project as I had initially planned, but I'm still very excited to partake in the jam.

I know the moving platforms are jank as can be.

Upon hearing the theme loop I thought of a never ending level that kept repeating, but then  I thought to myself, "What if the player was the one that looped?" 

Also I swear it's not a virus idk why it insists that it is.
